programs.name: ColorFlow
programs.notes: A welcoming art group for creative self-expression and mindfulness through paint. Explore emotions, connect with others, and find calm through color. No art experience needed.

programs.name: Intentional Silence & Meditation
programs.notes: A peaceful, grounding space to slow down, breathe, and reconnect with yourself. Explore stillness, mindfulness, and the power of silence as a way to rest, reflect, and find calm in community.

programs.name: Cultivate & Connect
programs.notes: A grounding art group exploring creativity, connection, and mindfulness through nature. Inspired by natural materials and the senses, celebrating growth, self-expression, and community through hands-on creation.

programs.name: Healing with Photography
programs.notes: A creative group for exploring healing, identity, and self-expression. Using photography as a mindful practice to reflect on experiences, notice moments of beauty, and connect.

programs.name: Karaoke Night
programs.notes: An open space for joy, laughter, and self-expression through song. Come as you are — sing solo, join in with others, or cheer from the crowd as we build confidence, connection, and community through music.
